alert.note: Alert for Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:19PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Blaine County through 445 PM MDT... At 417 PM MDT, the public reported pea to dime size hail from a strong thunderstorm near Gannett, or 10 miles south of Hailey, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hailey, Bellevue and Gannett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Sun Valley Region; Wood River Foothills
